mapper.select: SELECT equipment_info.id, equipment_info.site_id AS `site.id`, equipment_info.`name`, equipment_info.num, equipment_info.buy_date, equipment_info.produce_date, equipment_info.inspection_date, equipment_info.inspection_time, equipment_info.manager_id AS `equipmentManager.id`, equipment_info.teacher_id AS `trainningTeacher.id`, equipment_info.state, equipment_info.rent_fee, equipment_info.rent_date, equipment_info.return_date, equipment_info.rent_people, equipment_manager.`name` AS `equipmentManager.name`, site_info.classroom_code AS `site.classroomCode`, equipment_manager.`code` AS `equipmentManager.code` FROM equipment_info INNER JOIN equipment_manager ON equipment_info.manager_id = equipment_manager.id INNER JOIN site_info ON equipment_info.site_id = site_info.id WHERE equipment_info.state > 0 AND site_info.state > 0 AND equipment_manager.state = 1 AND equipment_info.id = #{id}

SELECT equipment_info.id, equipment_info.site_id AS `site.id`, equipment_info.`name`, equipment_info.num, equipment_info.buy_date, equipment_info.produce_date, equipment_info.inspection_date, equipment_info.inspection_time, equipment_info.manager_id AS `equipmentManager.id`, equipment_info.teacher_id AS `trainningTeacher.id`, equipment_info.state, equipment_info.rent_fee, equipment_info.rent_date, equipment_info.return_date, equipment_info.rent_people, equipment_manager.`name` AS `equipmentManager.name`, site_info.classroom_code AS `site.classroomCode`, equipment_manager.`code` AS `equipmentManager.code` FROM equipment_info INNER JOIN equipment_manager ON equipment_info.manager_id = equipment_manager.id INNER JOIN site_info ON equipment_info.site_id = site_info.id WHERE equipment_info.state > 0 AND site_info.state > 0 AND equipment_manager.state = 1
